item.title: Alot of fly-tipping, 16th June
item.description:
The adopted road which looks like an alley way the runs down the back of Albert st+ Hungerford st in St Paul’s is a FLYTIPPING hotspot now the town centre tip has shut. Once people see this they add too it. I live on the corner of the alley way and am always clearing up stuff and personally taking stuff to the tip Myself . Please please can this be picked up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, St Paul's Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped black panel and mirror Brunswick St, 16th June
item.description:
A mirror and a black panel (stove top?) have been Flytipped on the pavement opposite 14 Brunswick St, next to Lidl. The mirror has already been broken a bit. Please can they be removed before they get smashed any more

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brunswick Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Large overgrown vegetation/weeds blocking footpath, 16th June
item.description:
I have copied and pasted the following email that was sent to me reporting this problem - Please can someone contact the contractor responsible for maintaining the walkway between Boverton Drive and Boverton Avenue. It is extremely overgrown with weeds and undergrowth making it very difficult to access. This morning followed a blind gentleman trying to navigate his way through with great difficulty.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Boverton Avenue, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 16th June
item.description:
